changeSet.author: mag
changeSet.sql: create table language ( language_id integer primary key autoincrement not null, locale_id text, name text, created_at integer, created_by integer, updated_at integer, updated_by integer );

create table localisation ( localisation_id integer primary key autoincrement not null, en_ca text unique, fr_ca text, created_at integer, created_by integer, updated_at integer, updated_by integer );

create table account ( account_id integer primary key autoincrement not null, email text not null unique check (length(email) > 0), name text check (length(name) > 0), stripe_cus_id text, language_id integer, password_digest text, password_reset_digest text, password_reset_requested_at integer, created_at integer, created_by integer, updated_at integer, updated_by integer, foreign key (language_id) references language (language_id) );

create table account_token ( account_token_id integer primary key autoincrement not null, selector text not null, validator text not null, account_id integer not null, created_at integer, created_by integer, updated_at integer, updated_by integer, foreign key (account_id) references account (account_id) );
create table price ( price_id integer primary key autoincrement not null, stripe_price_id text, stripe_product_id text, amount integer not null );

create table subscription ( subscription_id integer primary key autoincrement not null, account_id integer not null, price_id integer not null, stripe_sub_id text, start_at integer, end_at integer, status text, created_at integer, created_by integer, updated_at integer, updated_by integer, foreign key (account_id) references account (account_id), foreign key (price_id) references price (price_id) );

create table calendar ( calendar_id integer primary key autoincrement not null, enable_fr integer check (enable_fr IN (0, 1)), enable_en integer check (enable_en IN (0, 1)), name_fr text, name_en text, description_fr text, description_en text, link_fr text unique, link_en text unique, primary_color text, secondary_color text, start_week_on text, public_calendar integer check (public_calendar IN (0, 1)), event_approval_required integer check (event_approval_required IN (0, 1)), created_at integer, created_by integer, updated_at integer, updated_by integer, embed_calendar integer check (embed_calendar IN (0, 1)), show_event_author integer check (show_event_author IN (0, 1)) );

create table calendar_access ( calendar_access_id integer primary key autoincrement not null, account_id integer not null, calendar_id integer not null, status text, created_at integer, created_by integer, updated_at integer, updated_by integer, foreign key (account_id) references account (account_id), foreign key (calendar_id) references calendar (calendar_id) );

create table event ( event_id integer primary key autoincrement not null, account_id integer not null, calendar_id integer not null, status text, name_fr text, name_en text, description_fr text, description_en text, start_at integer, end_at integer, all_day integer check (all_day IN (0, 1)), hyperlink_fr text, hyperlink_en text, created_at integer, created_by integer, updated_at integer, updated_by integer, foreign key (account_id) references account (account_id), foreign key (calendar_id) references calendar (calendar_id) );

create table email_template ( email_template_id integer primary key autoincrement not null, name text, title_fr text, title_en text, body_fr text, body_en text, created_at integer, created_by integer, updated_at integer, updated_by integer );

create table activity ( activity_id integer primary key autoincrement not null, account_id integer not null, type text, description text, created_at integer, created_by integer, updated_at integer, updated_by integer, foreign key (account_id) references account (account_id) );
create table tax ( tax_id integer primary key autoincrement not null, stripe_tax_id text, description text, created_at integer, created_by integer, updated_at integer, updated_by integer );
